Text.Page:
There's nothing quite as frightening as going up against a {@LinkCreature:31#21#naga colossus}. They're like storms themselves, as strong and destructive as they are.

But I'll bet they're no trouble for a sturdy like you! In fact, I'll bet you could kill a lot of colossi and bring back their unit insignias.
You're something all right! Nice work!
I don't care what anybody says. I think you can take on a {@LinkCreature:31#21#naga colossus}.
